alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 3:24PM PST until December 01 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...LIGHT TO MODERATE SNOW TO CONTINUE IN IDAHO AND PORTIONS OF EASTERN WASHINGTON THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. * WHERE...Wauconda, Boulder Creek Road, Chesaw Road, Republic, Inchelium, Sherman Pass, and Highway 20 Wauconda Summit. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Motorists should be prepared for winter driving conditions Wednesday night into Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers will be isolated to scattered in nature with quick bursts of snow up to one inch per hour.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
